Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is accessible after hours which is handy for when I am working late and need an answer immediately. I feel AI has been a great help in my assignment, specifically with coding. I do not use it to edit any university assignment writing because of copyright reasons, however if I am having an error in my code that I cannot understand it is very helpful in pointing out the error in my logic. Teachers can do this too, it is mostly the accessability

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: No real differences, for me teachers and AI fill different roles. I'd never use AI to answer a question if I have a teacher easily accessible to me.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: I find that sometimes AI misses some details that teachers can see, sometimes it will try to give me an answer that I know is wrong and when I try to correct it it just gives me the same answer back.
